attributes.action: Better trans healthcare in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Because transgender health care is massively under funded and suicide rates in transgender people are shockingly high. NHS waiting times are disgustingly long.
attributes.background: Increase the NHS funding for gender identity clinics and allow easier access to hormone therapy through GP surgery’s while waiting for referrals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Increase funding for NHS transgender services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594283
